bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of xuan 癬 , xuan -illness, developing on the eyebrows. When cured the eyebrows do not grow again. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry xuan fu hua 旋覆花 quoting XEWSZWLF 2: 赤芝散，治小兒眉毛眼睫，因癬退不生，名乳頰癬 , “Powder with chi zhi : to cure the failure of eyebrows and eyelashes to grow again once a xuan -illness has receded. This is called ‘milk-cheeks xuan -illness ’”, writes: 小 兒眉癬：小兒眉毛眼睫，因癬退不生 , “ Eyebrow xuan -illness in children: When eyebrows and eyelashes fail to grow once a xuan -illness has receded”.
